Text:
I can't yet comment on the file quality or tags but from what I've seen I have to say this is how a modern discography torrent should be done. High bitrate, sorted labeled and dated, category directories for studio and other material, complete, album art, everything kept as separate files instead of a .rar, with a thorough description. It's all here, and there's nothing I could suggest to improve it. Torrent creators take note.

Thanks l.diliberto.
41 seeders and nobody wants to tell us how this torrent is? you guys suck. i wont find out till i download the thing. =/

Great quality, ridiculous amount of effort obviously went into this gem. Thanks so much.

However, just noticed Technical Ecstacy songs wrongly labelled - e.g. Rock & Roll Doctor is actually All Moving Parts.

Before anyone b!thces about that, get off your @sses & label them yourselves!

Thanks again!

Just wanted to say thanks for this amazing quality torrent. It's not often you see this much effort put into something like a torrent, and we all truly appreciate it.
